Notifying task progress requires notification permissions. Cancel power-saving restrictions to enable background task execution FFmpegCommand Edit Command Line log loading info type size copy Copied to the clipboard Duration trimming Screen cropping Video scaling Video shifting Extract audio Video muting AV Info Start Time End Time Quick Crop Precise Crop Please wait repack Format conversion test export attributes Target format Audio format Video encoding format date extension Original format original width height Original resolution Incorrect or invalid input Original sample rate Invalid time selection End time must be greater than start time Select aspect ratio Ratio Original ratio Screen ratio Custom scale Select background color Privacy Policy
Audio and Video Editor (hereinafter referred to as the "App") is developed and provided by us. We understand the importance of personal information to you and are committed to protecting your privacy. Before using this App, please carefully read and understand this Privacy Policy. By starting to use this App, you agree to its entirety.

1. How We Collect and Use Your Information

This App integrates with third-party advertising services and displays advertisements when you use the App. To optimize ad display performance and calculate advertising data, we may collect the following information:

Device information: This includes device model, operating system version, and app version. This information is used to ensure that ads are displayed correctly on your device.

Ad interaction data: This includes the number of times you view and click on an ad. This data is anonymous and used only for ad display performance and revenue calculation purposes. It is not associated with your personally identifiable information.

Important: We do not collect personally identifiable information such as your name, phone number, or email address.

2. How We Use Cookies and Similar Technologies

The advertising service providers in this App may use cookies or other similar technologies to collect the aforementioned device information and ad interaction data to provide more relevant advertising content. These technologies are independently operated by advertising service providers.

3. How We Share and Publicly Disclose Your Information
 We promise not to share, transfer, or publicly disclose your personal information to any third-party company, organization, or individual without your explicit consent, except in the following circumstances:

To the extent permitted by law: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal process, or government mandates.

To protect the safety of this app and its users: For example, to investigate, prevent, or address fraud, security, or technical issues.

We only share anonymous ad interaction data with the aforementioned advertising service providers to enable ad display and revenue settlement.

4. Your Rights

As a user, you have the right to choose whether to continue using this app at any time. If you do not wish us to collect the aforementioned ad interaction data, you can choose to stop using this app.

5. How We Protect Your Information
 We implement reasonable security measures to protect the anonymous data we collect to prevent data loss, misuse, unauthorized access, or disclosure. However, please understand that no security measures can be 100% secure. 

6. Privacy Policy Updates
 We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If there are significant changes, we will notify you prominently within the app or through other appropriate means. The revised Privacy Policy will take effect upon posting.

7. Contact Us
 If you have any questions or suggestions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the following means:

Email: running_in_storm@qq.com

APP info Use the world's strongest open-source audio and video library FFmpeg on your phone. 
The current version of the audio and video editor supports functions such as executing ffmpeg command line , video format conversion, video duration and image cropping, video speed adjustment , extracting audio and video noise reduction, and obtaining audio and video information.
Error and crash logs Clear Cleared Cannot be restored after clearing Video duration Audio duration Ask me later Deny And Don't Ask Again File read and write Notification Grant Cancel power saving restrictions You can go to Settings/Permissions to disable power saving restrictions to avoid tasks being killed. Reminder when not granted Permissions Remind Input File Assisted Edit Self Edit Output File Parameter Parameter Template open Clear task logs Don't remind me again Welcome Welcome to this application. You can use the world's strongest open-source audio and video library FFmpeg on your mobile phone If you have any suggestions or feedback to the developers, you can provide feedback through the following email, group chat, or form.
